alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Moniteau; Monroe; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 8:34PM CST until December 15 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Boone County in central Missouri... Western Audrain County in central Missouri... Northwestern Callaway County in central Missouri... Monroe County in northeastern Missouri... Central Moniteau County in central Missouri... * Until 915 PM CST. * At 834 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Higbee to near Tipton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Madison around 850 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Jamestown, Paris, Easley, Ashland and Columbia Regional Airport. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 115 and 148. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Finger Lakes State Park, Union Covered Bridge Historic Site, Jewell Cemetery Historic Site, and Mark Twain Lake Recreational Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Moniteau; Monroe; Ralls
